bibl.title: Empedocles on the Ultimate Symmetry of the World.
bibl.note: Re-appraises Empedocles' cosmic cycle in light of new evidence from P. Stras. Inv. 1665-1666 [edd.: Alain MARTIN et Oliver PRIMAVESI, L'Empédocle de Strasbourg (Strasbourg - Berlin, 1999)].
bibl.seg: TRÉPANIER Simon, Empedocles on the Ultimate Symmetry of the World.
Re-appraises Empedocles' cosmic cycle in light of new evidence from P. Stras. Inv. 1665-1666 [edd.: Alain MARTIN et Oliver PRIMAVESI, L'Empédocle de Strasbourg (Strasbourg - Berlin, 1999)].
